description:
Do you work in Arab country and want to communicate with your colleagues in a better way?

Are you fascinated with ancient Arab civilizations and want to fulfill you dream by visiting an Arab country?

We are here to help you along the way to fulfill your dreams!!!

Join our happy students and learn the basics of Arabic conversation the easy way.


Course Highlights:

  • Professional trainers support provided outside course boundaries
  • High quality training course contains basic Arabic conversations
  • 17 lectures contain HD quality videos total 2 hour of conversations
  • Arabic native speaker professionals are available to boot your learning
  • Lectures are provided in PDF format at the end of each section
  • Phonetics guide included along the way inside course slides
  • 25 questions to test your absorption of the material at the end of each section
  • 100+ Arabic words that become useful in different situations
  • Vocabulary discussion lectures and long discussions upon completion of each section
title: Conversational Arabic Made Easy
